programme.title: The Achieveables
programme.desc: A group of adventurers with disabilities spend three challenging days on the Kootenay River, known for its wild rapids, moody weather and stunning scenery. The Achievables is a story or tenacity, community, pain and triumph in the face of obstacles.

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc: Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S06EP05) Murdoch investigates a murder at a nudist community.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Ness Murby - Transcending
programme.desc:
(S01EP04) Ness and Eva are in a rush to get new gear and perform well as they head into the final competition of the season. This is Ness' last chance to fight for his place on the Canadian National Team.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S01EP02) A single mom, para-athlete, full-time student and an aspiring broadcaster, Claire is a powerful, accomplished woman lost in oversized clothing and a look that doesn't reflect who she really is.
Année : 2022

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S06EP06) Gowen strikes oil, which splits Hope Valley into the haves and have-nots. Abigail must settle a dispute among the landowners. Elizabeth must quell Cody's jealousy when Robert's family comes into money. Nathan urges Bill to re-examine judgeship offer.
Année : 2014
Avec : Jack Wagner (Bill Avery) Pascale Hutton (Rosemary LeVeaux-Coulter) Kavan Smith (Leland Coulter) Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen)

programme.title: REAL STORIES with Laura Bain
programme.desc:
We introduces viewers to everyday role models across the Canadian disability community. Laura Bain goes beyond disability stereotypes to spotlight compelling individuals leading full, engaged lives.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:

Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S05EP01) An in-depth look at a Paralympian Collin Cameron, and the community who rallied behind his vision to build Ontario's first Para Nordic Training Centre.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S02EP03) If something can go wrong, it will. It's Murphy's Law and it's Chris and Alex's curse as they build a stylish Murphy bed and fold-up breakfast nook.

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:

Année : 2008

programme.title: Mind Your Own Business
programme.desc:
(S01EP04) Ryan Benoit runs a clothing brand from a storefront in Sudbury, Ontario. He wants to expand the brand to other parts of the country, but has to navigate his way past a major setback before that happens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
In 2007, Donalda Jones started REALM, a non-profit charity to help others benefit from a disability network. Since then, REALM has helped over 40 individuals of all abilities carry out their dreams.
